author: djrtwo
content:
On medalla, we will ensure we run through a complete list of all "expected" behaviours wrt consensus state transitions (exits, slashings, empty blocks, full blocks, etc).

In addition to Medalla, we are running a series of "attack nets" on which white hat hackers are bringing networks down for bounties (https://github.com/ethresearch/public-attacknets)

And in addition to that, we are subjecting each client to a series of load tests under various scenarios (starting a few weeks from now)
